projectGridLines.stationName: RAJ Krishna Construction Company Pvt. Ltd, New Delhi
projectGridLines.title: 1 Construction of “The Wilton” Residency at Ayali Khurd, Hambran Road Ludhiana 2 Civil Construction Control along with estimation and tendering at S-28, Greater Kailash-II, New Delhi-110048
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Construction of “The Wilton” Residency at Ayali Khurd, Hambran Road Ludhiana by RAJ Krishna Construction Company Pvt. Ltd.

 

Description: Civil & Structure work of Project “ The Wilton” of 23 Storey Height

 

Skill sets/ Trait Expectation/ Expected learning: The skill set that would be gained is hands on experience of construction of multi-storey building as RCC, Reinforcement, shuttering, plaster work is going on. The student can also learn the measurement and billing part of the Civil work. He will also learn the required quality parameters and how they are achieved of all above mentioned works. He will also learn how a civil contract is formed and got executed at a larger scale of 8-10 lakh sqft fast paced construction with latest engineering techniques.

 

Specific courses required for project execution: Preferably Civil

Title: Civil Construction Control along with estimation and tendering at S-28, Greater Kailash-II, New Delhi-110048 i.e. Head Office of RAJ Krishna Construction Company Pvt. Ltd.

 

Description: Estimating, Tendering, Monitoring and Controlling multiple Big Civil Housing Projects of 8 – 10 lakh Sqft Area

 

Skill sets/Traits expectation/Expected learning: Estimation, Tendering, Monitoring, Technical Guiding and Technical handling of multiple Civil projects from Head Office  

 

Specific courses required for project execution: Preferably Civil
